full_summary:
**Telecommunication Equipment Installation at 4 Thunder Bay Area Sites**

**Solicitation Number:** 2023-40-3296/A
**Publication Date:** April 19, 2024
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** May 7, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Procurement Overview**

This request for proposal (RFP) aims to solicit bids for the installation of telecommunication equipment at four sites in the Thunder Bay area, Ontario. The RCMP requires construction services to accomplish this project. This is the first phase (Phase 1) of a two-stage competitive bidding process. Phase 1 will pre-qualify bidders based on mandatory requirements outlined in the attached tender documents. Phase 2 will invite pre-qualified bidders to provide a financial bid on the project, according to the specifications and drawings.

**Key Requirements**

* Mandatory site visit included in Phase 2
* Security requirements associated with this project
* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
* Refer to the attached tender documents for further information

**Tendering Procedure**

The tendering procedure is open, and the selection criteria is lowest price. Tenders must be submitted to the following email address: Charles.Langlois@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

**Additional Information**

* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. As a result, the integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities.
* Canada will make available Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), bid solicitations, and related documents for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.
* Indigenous Procurement: The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous business capacity.

**Contact Information**

Procuring Office: RCMP – Procurement and Contracting Branch
Address: Royal Canadian Mounted Police – Procurement & Contracting Branch
73 Leikin dr.
Ottawa, ON
K1A 0R2
Email address: Charles.Langlois@rcmp-grc.gc.ca


Please make sure to change the order to make it look tidy and more English-Bilingual format as per OW (official language) Act.
